word embedding.from sentence: In our experiments , all word embedding are initialized by the pre-trained Glove vector 2 .

biases.from sentence: All the weight matrices are given the initial value by sampling from the uniform distribution U ( ?0.1 , 0.1 ) , and all the biases are set to zero .

position embedding.from sentence: The dimension of position embedding is set to 100 , which is randomly initialized and updated during the training process .

hidden units.from sentence: The dimension of the word embedding and aspect term embedding are set to 300 , and the number of the hidden units are set to 200 .
